title: E98 Exorcism Colonics and a Hot Sauce Love Potion
description:
So sorry, everyone, we have to reschedule. We have a demonic assault penciled in for 3pm today. But in the meantime, Em brings us a movie report of the Vatican exorcist, Father Amorth, and how the director of the Exorcist (the film) witnessed his first real-life demonic possession. On the true crime side, Christine, hot off her jaguar-filled honeymoon, tells the tragic story of the death of Tina Watson, who died under suspicious circumstances while scuba diving in Australia on her own 2003 honeymoon. And lastly, get ready, because we're quitting the podcast game to become full-time bubble wrap salespeople… and that's why we drink!



Please consider supporting the companies that support us! 



Get 40% off your first Legacy Box order when you go to legacybox.com/drink



For 40% off all Lola subscriptions, visit mylola.com and enter code DRINK40



Start your free wedding website or registry when you go to zola.com/drink



Get your first Quip refill pack for free when you go to getquip.com/atwwd
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
